== Ack ==

To search type _:Ack [options] {pattern} {(directories)}
It searches recursively in {[directories]} (which defaults to the current directory)

====== Options ======

_-i_ Ignores case distinction in pattern
_-v_ Inverts the search pattern

====== File extension ======

Instead of specifying a directory you can specify a file extension instead.
Just add _--_ followed by the extension. _--js_, _--css_ .
Warning .jsx and .elm are not supported.

==== Key bindings ====

_o_ or <Enter> Opens the file
_O_ Opens the file and closes the quicklist window
_go_ Open a preview of the file but maintains focus on the quicklist window
_h_ Opens a horizontal split
_v_ Opens a vertical split
_q_ closes the quicklist window
